item.title: Mark Ronson’s Latest High Note
item.description: The high-flying DJ, record producer and songwriter who produced SNL’s 50th anniversary concert just collected a brand new honor: Emmy nominee.

item.title: Bill Hader Reveals Anxiety Kept Him From Participating in ‘SNL50’ Sketch
item.description: The actor, who was a castmember on the NBC variety show from 2005-2013, was unexpectedly absent from this year’s 50th anniversary celebration.
